channel.title: Talks on guumaster
channel.description: Recent content in Talks on guumaster

item.title: Frameworks serverless for Kubernetes
item.description: Given at: PyCon Alicante 2019 Language: spanish Presentation: Google Slides Abstract: This talk is a review of four different serverless framework that runs on Kubernetes, I talk about the developer experience, maturity level of OpenFaas, Nuclio, Kubeless and Fission. Youtube Google Slides

item.title: Sobrevive al inframundo de los tests end to end
item.description: Given at: Codemotion Madrid 2017 Language: spanish Presentation: Speaker Deck Abstract: How to survive to the underworld of end-to-end testing is an overview of tips and tricks we learn during or work with ATDD, Cucumber and Gherkin. Youtube Speakerdeck

item.title: Coding Best Practice
item.description: This is a talk that I gave on our JS program at Intelygenz on 2019. The source is here and the presentation is online here.

item.title: Mastering NPM
item.description: Mastering NPM By the time we were starting to use npm at Intelygenz I prepare this talk that for our JS program. The source is here and the presentation is online here.

item.title: Functional Programming in JS
item.description: This is a talk that I gave on our JS program at Intelygenz on 2016. On The source is here and the presentation is online here.

item.title: Science Toolkit Workshop
item.description: Abstract Con la experiencia de haber desarrollado/desplegado en producción varias soluciones de AI/ML, hemos empaquetado nuestro set de herramientas Open Source y lo hemos llamado “Science Toolkit”. Este conjunto de herramientas lo usamos durante las fases de exploración de datos y desarrollo de modelos. Ahora queremos compartirla con la comunidad. Proposed to Madrid TechFest 2020

item.title: Konstellation - open-source tool to take ML&AI software to production
item.description: Abstract This talk with cover the experience of my team facing the challenge of taking ML/AI solutions from the research and development phase to actual software running in production. Proposed to: OpenExpo Europe 2020
